20211105154033.content: A lot has changed in this mod. For one, this has changed. But also the whole other things that turned into something amazing. Just kidding, it's just a test and the mod is exactly the same. :) New changelog auto post feature on Discord! Woo!

20211108172204.content: (Fabric only) Fixed a bug where trades would get more expensive on trading a lot.

20211108181750.content: The mod now correctly parses all characters in item names, like Â¢.

20211108183457.content: Fixed mobs with the Misc category not being shown in the mob drop list. Specifically Iron/Snow Golems and Villagers.

20211108190242.content: Added config option, enabled by default, which disables giving creepers a random mob effect. This due to them creating an area of a lingering effect which is probably not what you want. Feel free to enable them again though!

20211108230405.content:
When breaking placed down mob heads, they now correctly keep their mob head name on pickup.
Fixed grammatical mistake in log.
Fixed a crash due to incompatibility with the More Axolotl Variants mod and improved future compatibility with others.
Added config option to restrict head drops after player kills only.
Added config option to restrict head drops to charged creepers only.
Updated backend code.
(Fabric only) fixed /jmh command not being registered correctly.

20211109121831.content: (Fabric only) Fixed mod not loading correctly in a server environment with a custom spread block set.

20211109123448.content: (Fabric only) Fixed mod not loading custom blocks correctly in a server environment.

20211109123850.content: (Fabric only) Improved how the mod loads items from the config in a server environment.

20211109130105.content: (Fabric only) Fixed mod not working correctly due to an incorrect mapping.

20211109135930.content: (Forge only) Updated backend code. Released an up-to-date 1.12.2 version.

20211109163916.content:
Updated backend code.
Added better compatibility for smaller and modded trees.
Added config option 'automaticallyFindBottomBlock' which allows chopping down an entire tree via a middle block, enabled by default.
Added the config options 'loseDurabilityModifier' and 'increaseExhaustionModifier' to change the amount of durability and exhaustion on chopping down a tree.
(Forge only) Fixed the 1.12.2 version replacing an incorrect sapling type.

20211110190926.content: Added support for all alphabets within the custom names file. E.g. cyrillic and georgian.

20211110194326.content:
Updated backend code.
Increased support for modded villagers.

20211116123918.content: (Forge only) Fixed incorrect default 'chanceBabyRabbitIsKiller' config value.

20211116125513.content: Fixed non-jmh default heads (creeper/zombie/skeleton) not dropping when harvested.

20211116201159.content: Improved compatibility with modded cauldrons. You can now do the ritual with water-filled cauldrons in Minecraft 1.17.

20211117205630.content: Correctly specified java compatibility version for mixins.

20211121180615.content: (Forge only) Fixed reference to incorrect method in 1.16. Updated backend code.

20211121183203.content:
Improved modded villager support.
(Forge 1.12) Fixed an issue with a mod compatibility.

20211121210441.content:
Synchronized Collective's Fabric and Forge versions to 3.0.
Fixed a problem with certain characters from written books in the function that writes them to a string.
Updated backend code.

20211122182601.content: The mod has been completely rewritten. It's now much more compatible with other mods and more efficient. Fixes an incompatibility with Quark specifically.

20211122190208.content: Added compatibility with Simply Steel's modded hoes.

20211123095357.content: Fixed falling through a farmland block when un-tilling it while standing on top of it.

20211123100820.content: Replanting crops now does durability damage on the hoe used.

20211123101748.content: Improved compatibility with modded poison spiders.

20211123192633.content: Added feature to lower the clock when a potion effect is active, to prevent overlap. Can be toggled with the 'lowerClockWhenPlayerHasEffects' config option, enabled by default.

20211123200606.content: Tree Harvester will now only work with logs of the same type, which is determined on the first log broken. This is to prevent unwanted behaviour with other trees or structures nearby.

20211124130040.content:
The Recursive Update!
With the config option 'enableRecursiveOpening' you can now open multiple door-type blocks when they are connected. By default those which are connected and a maximum of 10 blocks away.

20211126142847.content:
Added two config options.
ignorePaintingsInCycleResourceLocation and showRegisteredPaintingsDebug.
The first allows you to exclude certain paintings from showing up in the cycle, the other to find paintings to exclude via the console and debug lines.
By default the paintings from 
Infernal Expansion are excluded because they should only show up with their separate painting item.

20211126144320.content: (Fabric only) Fixed an issue of the mod referencing an incorrect callback, causing it not to boot.

20211126202653.content: (Fabric only) Added generic event callback for bone meal, adding compatibility for dispensers.

20211126204843.content: (Fabric only) Bone meal from dispensers now generates random flowers.

20211126211352.content: (Fabric only) Fixed kelp not working correctly on crops.

20211127135058.content:
Added support for FTB Team Islands, can be toggled in the config. The starter kit will also be set after the '/ftbteamislands create' command.
Of course a fully optional dependency.

20211127171352.content: Added TaskFunctions related to enqueuing tasks to the next tick.

20211127172032.content:
Updated backend code.
Fixed a crash due to a mod incompatibility causing a ServerHangWatchdog error.
Fixed multiple bees spawning during breeding.
Fixed baby bees suffocating. All suffocation damage has been disabled for bees, can be toggled in the config.

20211128171446.content: The mod now works separate from the in-game chat, adding support for other languages than English.

20211128182759.content: Fixed nullpointer when a command was run by a non-player.

20211129223044.content: Changed empty string check in StringFunctions to use isEmpty() which prevents unwanted message behaviour.

20211130185930.content: Changed the default spread config file.

20211201221307.content: Fixed incorrect behaviour when opening a single door.

20211203221515.content: (Fabric only) Bump required Fabric Loader version to at least 0.12.6 on 1.18 to prevent "JAVA_17 could not be set".

20211203223841.content: (Fabric only) Updated ConfigFunctions to correctly read the fabric-style config files.

20211203230213.content: (Fabric only) Another fix to ConfigFunctions. Fixed CommandsMixin warning.

20211204070450.content: (Fabric only) Fixes an InvalidInjectionException on world load causing a crash.

20211211201514.content: (1.18.1 only) Fixed mod not initializing correctly due to missing file.

20211211214013.content: (Forge 1.18.1 only) Fixed incorrect areas version referenced.

20211216124654.content: Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20211216190745.content: (Fabric only) Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20211216191634.content: Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20211216193410.content: Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20211216194219.content: Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20211216195032.content: Increased mod compatibility by disabling mixins when another mod changes the target method, which before this would cause a hard crash.

20220202204204.content: Fixed the ServerGamePacketListenerImplMixin causing other mods to have unexpected behaviour when they rely on chat for input.

20220202205330.content: (Fabric only) Updated mod to work with changes made in Collective (Fabric) v3.15.

20220203081832.content: (Fabric 1.18.1 only) Removed a debug line which changed all server chat messages to "lol". Apologies for that one.

20220204171831.content:
Updated to major version 4.0.
Backend code has been optimized and made to look cleaner.
Better performance and easier to work with.
Thanks for downloading!

20220204210314.content: (Fabric only) Fixed a bug causing Minecraft to prompt for safe load or not start the game.

20220206151917.content: (Fabric 1.16.x only) Fixed items prevented from being loaded into the world.

20220206173248.content:
(Fabric only) Added left-click-block event callback.
Added silencer for "Mismatch in destroy block pos" messages.

20220216174816.content: (Fabric only) Added various callbacks related to item use.

20220217145720.content: Updated mod to use mixins instead of a custom sponge block to increase compatibility.

20220217151354.content: (Fabric only) Made some changes to MinecraftMixin to increase compatibility with snapshot versions.

20220217162339.content: Extended ConfigFunctions to receive config values in a dictionary format before config classes are loaded to be able to for example use them within mixins.

20220217173308.content: (Fabric only) Corrected mod url. Lowered PlayerMixin priority.

20220217181105.content: Updated lots of backend code to make the mod work as intended.

20220217182249.content: Fixed the config 'preventEndermenFromAttacking' not working correctly.

20220220104350.content: (Fabric only) Fixed whenever an entity that was not a player consumed an item causing a crash.

20220227232253.content: Added the 'guiCompassFormat' config option which allows users to specify what is shown in the GUI.

20220228193009.content: (Fabric only) Updated to work with Minecraft version 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220228224129.content: (Forge only) Improved mod compatibility by adding the custom tool action "light_campfire" and the tool type "flint_and_steel".

20220228231308.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated to work with Minecraft 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220228231424.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated to work with Minecraft 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220302013342.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated mod to work with 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220302013525.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated mod to work with 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220302013746.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated mod to work with 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220302013942.content: (Fabric 1.18 only) Updated mod to work with 1.18.2 and future snapshots.

20220302021410.content: (Forge 1.18.2 only) Fixed wrong Areas dependent version.

20220303001842.content: Grouped furnace recycle recipes correctly to make the smelting recipe book look a lot cleaner.

20220303181730.content: The find surface block position now correctly considers water to be on the surface.

20220303235915.content:
Improved compatibility with modded compasses.
Fixed desync issues with compass directions.
Fixed a compass not being detected in the offhand.

20220304143357.content: Updated code efficiency when the GUI format is changed.

20220304145516.content: (Fabric only) Updated backend code and corrected version syntax.

20220304160459.content:
Backend code simplified and improved.
Fixed the shield sometimes not showing up even when blocking.
Improved code efficiency.

20220304201846.content: (Fabric only) Improved the way how Collective attempts to prevent mod reposting.

20220304213831.content:
Fixed weighted plates not triggering double doors correctly.
Improved code efficiency.

20220305165748.content: Updated NumberFunctions to correctly parse null variables.

20220305191155.content:
Added the `beeHiveBeeSpace` config value which overwrites how many bees can go inside a hive.
Improved code efficiency.
Improved compatibility with other mods.
Fixed a server hang/crash on world generation.

20220305194345.content: Configured BlockPosFunctions to be more efficient.

20220305221339.content: Fixed a hoe going into negative durability instead of breaking when tilling a large area.

20220305230923.content: Mod completely rewritten to increase compatibility with other mods and fix cases where mushrooms weren't able to be placed in daylight.

20220306161510.content:
Fixed 1.17 mobs not dropping their head in later versions.
Updated backend code.
(1.19 only) Added Warden mob head.

20220306181818.content: Added function that parses item damage and when broken correctly runs a forge/fabric itemDestroyed event.

20220307214259.content:
The big 5.0 update!
Improved the algorithm behind which logs and leaves should be broken. This creates better remaining trees (next to the one harvested) and no more floating leaf blocks.
Huge mushrooms can now be harvested just like trees.
The amount of time it takes to harvest a tree is determined by the amount of logs.
Added config option to increase/slow down fast leaf decay.
Improved the search for a bottom block for 2x2 trees.
Added compatibility with Stack Refill.
The mod now fires the BlockBreak and BlockPlace event.
Added blacklist feature to disable certain axe types from being able to harvest trees.
Overall improved backend code.

20220308001631.content: Added max distance to recursive lookup functions.

20220314202923.content:
Improved multi-dimension support.
Fixed the mod not working as intended in multiplayer.

20220314204239.content: Fixed chopping down log blocks being slow without it being part of a tree.

20220314205344.content: Fixed followers being duplicated in the GUI list between world joins.

20220314222436.content: Fixed doors closing incorrectly when multiple players were nearby.

20220314224322.content: Fixed doors not closing after last update.

20220319202340.content:
(Fabric only) Updated backend code
(Fabric 1.19 only) Updated to work with the latest snapshot 22w11a.

20220319204351.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated to work with the latest snapshot 22w11a.

20220319204558.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated to work with the latest snapshot 22w11a.

20220319204905.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated to work with the latest snapshot 22w11a.

20220319210230.content: (Forge only) Fixed the /jph command not being registered correctly.

20220319221532.content: Fixed Endermen still being able to pick up blocks.

20220607195344.content:
Updated Collective (Fabric) to the Minecraft 1.19 release.
Updated backend code.

20220607203822.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated mod to work with the latest 1.19 release version.

20220607204535.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated mod to work with Minecraft's latest 1.19 release version.

20220607204704.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated mod to work with Minecraft's latest 1.19 release version.

20220607231410.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated mod to work with Minecraft's latest 1.19 release version.

20220607234904.content: (Fabric 1.19 only) Updated mod to work with Minecraft's latest 1.19 release version.

20220608021251.content:
Updated mod to work with Minecraft's latest 1.19 release version.
Added 1.19 heads: allay, cold frog, temperate frog, warm frog, tadpole, warden.

20220608034103.content:
Fixed bug in mod registering function.
Updated backend code.

20220614095541.content:
Added suggestions to the /ec command. You can now use Tab to autocomplete enchantment names.
The mod now gets available enchantments from the registry, instead of a list.
(1.19 only) Fixed the wrong enchantment being applied.

20220717091914.content:
(1.19 only) Updated Collective to Forge version 41.0.99+. Use 
collective-1.19.0-4.28.jar if you're on an older version.
Updated backend code

20220717121415.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Updated to Forge version 41.0.94+. Use the previous uploaded file if you're on an older version.

20220717123617.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Updated to Forge version 41.0.94+. Use the previous uploaded file if you're on an older version.

20220717123840.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Fixed mod not loading correctly.

20220717124012.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Updated to Forge version 41.0.94+. Use the previous uploaded file if you're on an older version.

20220717124121.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Updated to Forge version 41.0.94+. Use the previous uploaded file if you're on an older version.

20220717130808.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Updated to Forge version 41.0.94+. Use the previous uploaded file if you're on an older version.

20220717131320.content: (Forge 1.19 only) Fixed incorrect Areas dependency version.

20220728094124.content: (Forge 1.19.1 only) Fixed incorrect Areas version reference.

20220730124813.content:
Changed the version syntax of fabric mods. Due the subversions (e.g. 1.19 -> 1.19.1) increasingly being different, it's no longer reliable to have the same mod version for all subversions of Minecraft. From now on, there will be a new release for each. This will hopefully prevent confusion and make the whole updating process a lot more reliable for me and you, the user.
(1.19.1 only) Released Collective (Fabric) for Minecraft version 1.19.1.

20220730185334.content: (Fabric 1.19.1 only) Fixed incorrect Collective (Fabric) dependency reference.

20220730185549.content: (Fabric 1.19.1 only) Fixed incorrect Collective (Fabric) dependency reference.

20220730185755.content: (Fabric 1.19.1 only) Fixed incorrect Collective (Fabric) dependency reference.

20220801135906.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the mod wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220801141034.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the bee hive cap config wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220801141822.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the mod wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220801142137.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the mod wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220801143001.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the mod wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220801143306.content:
(Forge only) Changed the mixin file name to be unique, fixing overlap with other mods.
If the mod wasn't working before, this will most likely fix it.

20220802162904.content:
Passive Endermen has had a big code overhaul. Fixing incompatibilities and incorrect spawning behaviour.
Gave the mixin config file a unique identifier.
The mod is a lot more reliable now.

20220802183531.content: Added support for modded water buckets in the isHoldingWater function. Thanks @cech12 on Github for the pull request.

20220809170334.content:
Updated mod description.
(Fabric) Fixed an issue where wheat seeds were consumed twice when placed on farmland.

20220814130641.content:
Items will now retain name formatting when sharpened and infiniteCreativeUses config option added. Thanks @fmpreferences on Github for the pull request.
Fixed sendUsesLeftInChat config not working correctly.
The italic styling in the item name from the uses left will now be removed when the tool is no longer sharpened.
Updated mod description.
(Fabric) Improved grindstone block right-click detection.

20220815123525.content:
Added the snow golem head, it's a small pumpkin!
Optimized backend code
(Fabric) Fixed the console message shown when a mob was killed.

20220823100657.content:
Updated backend code.
Updated mod description.

20220823165421.content:
Added access transformer file, which makes accessing private fields a lot easier for future builds.
Updated the chargeEntity function to use AT's.

20220823165938.content:
The mod no longer uses lightning to charge creepers, but edits the entity's data directly.
Creepers no longer spawn with 15/20 health.
Updated mod description.

20220823170711.content: (Fabric) Fixed typo in access widener file reference.

20220823174120.content: Added support for ageable entities in the Spawn Mob code. If a replaced entity is a baby, the new entity will also be a baby.

20220823174634.content:
Added support for the new Collective changes.
Fixes a bug where two cows could spawn an adult mooshroom cow, instead of a baby.

20220824153011.content: Improved the way Collective tries to find the center of a nearby village. Increasing performance.

20220824154253.content:
Decreased world loading time by a lot. Fixing the issue of having to wait at 0% generation for a long time.
Added support for modded villages.
Added log messages for when the mod starts looking for and has found a village.

20220824163024.content: Further improved BlockPosFunctions, increasing compatibility with other mods.

20220825104139.content:
Added compatibility with Village Spawn Point. You no longer spawn high up in the sky with both mods installed.
Updated backend code.

20220825165842.content:
Added the SignFunctions class, which adds easy access to sign contents.
Updated FABFunctions to work with block positions and not just entities.

20220825172502.content:
The mod has completely been rewritten. This fixes various issues.
Performance has been improved by a lot.
The TPS lag in servers has been fixed.
You can now remove a sign created by the mod and place your own if you want. Make sure it's within a 15 block radius of the old sign.
The mod is, combined with the latest Collective update, now compatible with modded villages.

20220826103718.content:
Added function to find BlockEntities such as campfires via BlockTags. Thanks @Brittank88 on Github for the work.
Improved backend performance.

20220826104828.content:
Added support for modded campfires.
Updated mod description.

20220826110941.content:
Added support for modded campfires.
Updated mod description.

20220905140141.content:
Updated EntityFunctions.
Cleaned up code and added setEntityFlag function.

20220905151032.content:
Improved takeoff code! Easier taking off with less simulated rockets.
The mod now uses TickEvents instead of a delayed function.
Fixed being able to use a free rocket by taking the elytra off mid-air and re-equiping it.
Improved performance.

20220905182302.content:
Added support for modded crops that extend the CropBlock.
Fixed the hoe being able to go below 0 durability on use.

20220906180543.content: Extended EntityFunctions to work with Villagers, Wandering Traders and their merchant offers.

20220906180759.content:
The mod has been completely rewritten! Improved performance and reliance.
Added config option to disable infinite villager trades, if you for example only want infinite wandering trader trades.
(Fabric) Fixed an issue of prices going up lots (demand).
Updated mod description.

20220914143934.content: Added functions related to in-game settings.

20220916120604.content:
Added a multitide of functions related to sending messages, in their own class MessageFunctions.
Updated to work with MutableComponents directly.

20220916122718.content:
(Forge 1.19) Fixed mod not loading correctly server-side. Messages are now sent via the system.
Updated backend code.

20220916130048.content:
Moved the generation of the axe blacklist to the ServerStartingEvent, to prevent it from loading too early.
Improves compatibility with other mods.
Thanks @shartte on Github for the pull request.

20220916132519.content:
Fixed holding a clock in the offhand not counting towards having one in the inventory.
Updated backend code.

20220916133202.content: Fixed holding a compass in the offhand not counting towards having one in the inventory.

20220916141216.content: (Forge) Fixed the mod not working correctly due to a mixin not being applied outside the dev environment.

20220916142031.content: (Forge) Adds support for modded world types such as TerraForged.

20220916143857.content: Fixed Collective crashing when trying to spawn an entity into an incorrectly loaded world.

20220916152459.content:
Added the 'keepOriginalLootQuantityIfHigher' config option to fix an unintended nerf when a mob drops more than the set lootQuantity.
(1.19) Fixed magma cubes not dropping a Froglight when consumed by a frog.

20220916155644.content:
Improved compatibility with modded enchantments.
Improved code efficiency.
Updated mod description.

20220917130923.content:
Fixed a crash when a dimension was loaded before the WorldLoadEvent was run.
Improved performance by using WeakHashMaps to allow better garbage collection.

20220917141537.content:
(Fabric) Fixed incompatibilities with other mods due to an incorrectly applied ItemStackMixin.
 Fixes item events from other mods not being run correctly.
 Thanks @Pyrofab on Github for the code the current function is based on!

20220917141959.content: (Fabric) Updated Stack Refill to work with the latest changes in Collective version 4.63.

20220917150917.content: (Forge 1.19) The messages sent in the server now show up in the console and in logs.

20220917174556.content: Fixed the mod not working correctly with mustHoldHoeForReplanting set to false.

20220917181313.content: Fixed rare JsonSyntaxException due to mod incompatibility.

20220917184423.content:
Added the onlyUntillWithOtherHandEmpty config option, which allows placing seeds while holding them in the offhand.
Added compatibility with Advanced Netherite.

20220919121331.content:
Fixed incorrectly set mod version.
Updated mod description.

20220919130711.content:
Added an extra check to the recursive find block functions to prevent a StackOverflow error.
(Fabric) Fixed a nullpointerexception when checking if an entity was from a spawner.

20220919191931.content:
(Fabric) Added support for modded elytra's such as wings and colytra.
 Added support for the mod Elytra Boosters.

20220920223119.content:
The big 3.0 rewrite!
Improved code performance.
Fixed visual desyncs in the inventory, the mod now works better with clients.
Fixed snowballs and firework rockets not refilling.
Fixed crash due to mod incompatibility.
FIxed the offhand slot not being refilled correctly.
Improved refill during item tossing.
Fixed items sometimes not returning their container after consumption.

20220921212707.content:
Fixed mixin not applying correctly in some cases.
Updated mod description.

20220921215642.content:
White dye can now be used to dye blocks, beds and carpets in the world.
Added white wool recipe with white dye and any other coloured wool block.

20220921225217.content:
Fixed the config shouldHideRecipeBook not being read correctly on first run.
The recipe book is now also hidden in the furnace GUI.
Correctly added support for translation keys.
(1.19) Fixed mod not loading correctly.

20220922144338.content:
Fixed desyncs on the client when giving items such as a water bucket.
Updated mod description.

20220922152640.content:
Removed the extra right-click event check. The portal can now be created by just placing the portal blocks in the correct direction.
Added a configurable option to send a message to the player where the extra dragon egg drops.
If the dragon was killed by anything other than a player, the mod now has an extra check for players around to give the dragon egg to.
Updated mod description.

20220922162034.content: Changed the way saturation is applied when consuming milk, fixing an issue.

20220922171914.content: Added functions related to setting and resetting mob spawner delay.

20220922173605.content:
Improved performance by resetting the mob spawner delay after a spawn was denied by the mod, instead of having it keep checking for a possible spawn.
Fixed mob spawns sometimes not being blocked.
Updated mod description.

20220923191020.content:
Fixed the totem of undying effect not being applied.
Fixed mustHaveItemsInInventoryForCreation set to false not working correctly.
Fixed a bug which duplicated the player's main hand when the armor stand creation was set to false.
Fixed a crash when another mod increases the player inventory size.
Removed a debug line.

20220924191501.content: Updated GameSettingsFunctions to be able to set the gamma value in-game.

20220924192725.content:
Released an up-to-date version for Minecraft 1.19.2.
Added language file support for the keybinding.

20220924193834.content:
(2.0) Released an up-to-date version for Minecraft 1.19.2.
 Added language file support for the keybinding.
(2.1) Fixed version reference typo.

20220924211603.content:
Changed Fox head to Red Fox and Snow Fox heads.
Added Toast rabbit head.
Added Illusioner head.
Changed Killer rabbit head chance to 0.5.
Updated mod description.

20220925143206.content:
Cleaned up code.
(Fabric) Fixed painting cycle not working with modded paintings.

20220925150840.content: The mod now correctly changes the height of the time in the GUI with lowerClockWhenPlayerHasEffects enabled. For positive and negative effects.

20220925212008.content: Added the disableWaterConsumptionUnderwater config option, enabled by default, which prevents players from drinking water bottles underwater. This is to prevent an infinite oxygen loop.

20220925214944.content: Fixed the welcome message being sent whenever a player changed dimensions.

20220925221022.content:
Fixed spiderwebs being broken in spectator mode.
Cleaned up code.

20220925230516.content:
The wither rose is now blacklisted by default.
Changed the replacing of flowers to a server runnable.
(Fabric) Improved blacklist compatibility with other mods.

20220925233727.content: Changed the farmland that is being created underneath the crop block from what was around to the vanilla farmland, to prevent duplication of more expensive modded farmland.

20220926162207.content: Now also setting the demand variable to 0 when resetting a merchant's offer.

20220926185922.content: Cleaned up code in preparation for Fabric port.
